Teaching

Math 27300/[40 | 50] Basic Theory of Ordinary Differential Equations

Syllabus: See Canvas.

  • Regular Class: TTh [11:00 am-12:20 pm | 12:30 am-1:50 pm] @ [Eckhart 308 | Ryerson 177]
  • My Office Hour: T 3:00-4:30 pm, Th 9:00-10:30 am @ Eckhart 318
